```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, results = "asis")
```

```{r hide_stuff, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse); library(here); library(summarytools)
reqd_stats <- function(i) descr(i, stats = c("mean", "sd", "min", "q1", "med", "q3", "max"),
                                style = "rmarkdown")
dat <- list.files(here("process_data"), pattern = "*.csv") %>%
  map(~read_csv(here("process_data", .)))
names(dat) <- list.files(here("process_data"), pattern = "*.csv") %>%
  str_replace(., ".csv", "")
```

```{r stuff, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
res <- lapply(dat, reqd_stats)
print(res)
```
